mapper.select: SELECT G_AREA, G_NAME, G_IMG1, G_PRICE, G_PEOPLE, G_RES, G_ONELINE FROM GOODS WHERE G_FLAG=1 ORDER BY SYSDATE DESC
SELECT g.G_AREA, g.G_NAME, g.G_IMG1, g.G_PRICE, g.G_PEOPLE, g.G_RES, g.G_ONELINE FROM GOODS g, REVIEW r WHERE g.G_SEQ=r.G_SEQ AND (SELECT)
SELECT G_AREA, G_NAME, G_IMG1, G_PRICE, G_PEOPLE, G_RES, G_ONELINE, FROM GOODS WHERE G_AREA=#{g_area} AND G_FLAG=1 ORDER BY SYSDATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GOODS (G_SEQ, GU_SEQ, G_AREA, G_LAN, G_NAME, G_CONTS, G_FLAG, G_IMG1, G_IMG2, G_IMG3, G_IMG4, G_PRICE, G_PEOPLE, G_RES, G_ONELINE, G_INTRO, G_COS,G_MEET, G_ADDRESS,G_CNAME,G_TIME, G_CCONTS,G_DATE,G_REGDATE) VALUES (GOODS_SEQ.NEXTVAL ,#{gu_seq}, #{g_area}, #{g_lan},#{g_name},#{g_conts}, 0,#{g_img1},#{g_img2}, #{g_img3},#{g_img4},#{g_price}, #{g_people},#{g_res},#{g_oneline}, #{g_intro},#{g_cos},#{g_meet}, #{g_address},#{g_cname},#{g_time}, #{g_cconts},#{g_date},SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE GOODS SET G_FLAG=1,G_REGDATE=SYSDATE WHERE G_SEQ=#{g_seq}
UPDATE GOODS SET G_NAME=#{g_name}, G_CONTS=#{g_conts}, G_DATE=#{g_date}, G_MEET=#{g_meet}, G_IMG1=#{g_img1}, G_ADDRESS=#{g_address}, G_REGDATE=SYSDATE WHERE G_SEQ=#{g_seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (R_SEQ, M_SEQ, G_SEQ, R_CONTS, R_REGDATE, R_IMG, R_STAR, R_ANS, R_GUFLAG, R_FALG) VALUES (REVIEW_SEQ.NEXTVAL ,#{m_seq}, #{g_seq}, #{r_conts},SYSDATE,#{r_img}, #{r_star},NULL,0 1)
